sys_hub_flow.name: Set Project Issue Statuses

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Jira Project Issue Status Data
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_dabde4231bb7a4908b08419ead4bcb17

sys_hub_flow_input.label: Jira Project
sys_hub_flow_input.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_input_dabde4231bb7a4908b08419ead4bcb17

variable.display_value: If multiple records are found action
If multiple records are found action

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Get prior M2M links associated with this issue type
NOTE: A BR will eventually delete this IF the last M2M issue type/status link is ever deleted
A BR will delete this link if there are now NO jira project IDs associated
Set up the Issue Type/Status M2M link
NOTE: A BR will eventually delete this category IF the last associated status is ever deleted
Add the project ID to the M2M link's projects list

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Drop the project ID from any old M2M links for this project

sys_variable_value.value: The prior M2M link has the input Project ID in it

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Remember this link so we don't drop the project ID from it

sys_hub_flow_variable.label: Project Status IDs
sys_hub_flow_variable.name: var__m_sys_hub_flow_variable_dabde4231bb7a4908b08419ead4bcb17

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: Add the project ID to the M2M link's projects list
A BR will delete this link if there are now NO jira project IDs associated
Get prior M2M links associated with this issue type
Set up the Issue Type/Status M2M link
NOTE: A BR will eventually delete this IF the last M2M issue type/status link is ever deleted

variable.display_value: If multiple records are found action

sys_hub_action_instance.comment: NOTE: A BR will eventually delete this category IF the last associated status is ever deleted

sys_hub_flow_logic.comment: Drop the project ID from any old M2M links for this project
Remember this link so we don't drop the project ID from it

sys_variable_value.value: The prior M2M link has the input Project ID in it
